samples.description: This sample generates hand-picked terrains with different characteristic. It's a great display of how the materials used by the terrains might influence its mood. It contains 2 scenes: "Display 1.0" contains terrains that could be generated using TTG 1.X and "Display 2.X" contains terrains that can be generated using TTG 2.X.
This sample repeatedly creates completely random plane terraced terrains. It's a great display of the tool's capabilities and the different types of plane terrains it can create.
This sample simply creates completely random plane terraced terrains every five seconds. It's a great display of the tool's capabilities and the different types of plane terrains it can create.
